svg.text: Hi, I'm Behzad Qasemi â€” a researcher and practitioner in the field of cybersecurity.
For over a decade, I've been working in areas such as vulnerability assessment,
penetration testing, and system security analysis.
My interest in cybersecurity started at an early age, and over the years,
I've been committed to continuous learning and contributing to various projects
My goal is to help build a safer digital environment and raise awareness
about information security. I always strive to both learn and share knowledge
